text: Joy Wai-lok Lai (born 18 August 1998) is an Australian badminton player. She competed at the 2014 Summer Youth Olympics in Nanjing, China. Lai was the champion at the Waikato International tournament in the women's singles event. == Achievements == === Oceania Championships === Women's singles {| class="sortable wikitable" style="font-size: 90%;" !
